scripts.clean: if exist allure-results rd /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rd /s /q allure-report && if exist test-videos rd /s /q test-videos && if exist testmo-report.xml del testmo-report.xml
scripts.test:zephyr: npm run clean && set ZEPHYR_AUTH_TOKEN=YOUR_TOKEN&& set PROJECT_KEY=YOUR_PROJECT_KEY&& cucumber-js --format playwright-zephyr/lib/src/cucumber
scripts.test:testmo: npm run clean && cucumber-js --format junit:testmo-report.xml && testmo automation:run:submit --instance YOUR_INSTANCE_URL --project-id YOUR_PROJECT_ID --name "Playwright Test Run" --results testmo-report.xml --token YOUR_TESTMO_TOKEN
scripts.run:edge: set BROWSER=edge&& set CHANNEL=msedge&& npm run run
scripts.run:edge:headed: set HEADLESS=false&& set BROWSER=edge&& set CHANNEL=msedge&& npm run run
scripts.run:chrome: set BROWSER=chromium&& set CHANNEL=chrome&& npm run run
scripts.run:chrome:headed: set HEADLESS=false&& set BROWSER=chromium&& set CHANNEL=chrome&& npm run run
scripts.run:firefox:headed: set HEADLESS=false&& set BROWSER=firefox&& npm run run
scripts.run:webkit:headed: set HEADLESS=false&& set BROWSER=webkit&& npm run run
